    Crocodile Behavior Tutorial

    Maggie McGreal

    2023-11-28

    CrocodileBehaviorTutorial.rmd
    install.packages("googlesheets4")
    ## Installing package into '/tmp/RtmpeJQBOi/temp_libpath13280fbf8f'
## (as 'lib' is unspecified)

    The purpose of this R package is for analysis and visualization of remotely transmitted movement and behavioral data from animal-borne devices…. (behavior classification, ) This package will work with data obtained from custom-built satellite trackers developed by Dr. Youngho Shin This data includes measurements obtained from sensors such as: IMU, GPS, real-time clock, depth recorder, etc.

    library(googlesheets4)
googlesheets4::gs4_deauth()
crocodiles <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1b4j42SbcN0GZR6KgHRtEmRe5-D0qzYM1mZWo9-KC4d4/edit?usp=sharing")
    ## ✔ Reading from crocodile.
    ## ✔ Range Sheet1.
    #Install the package from git hub

devtools::install_github("mcgrealmaggie/crocodiles.pkg")
